TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BooleanOption extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

Docs.summary: Specifies a style option. This class cannot be inherited. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption> enumeration represents the state of a style. In ASP.NET, the `Font-Bold` or `Font-Italic` attributes take a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption> enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption False = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The specified style will not be applied. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption NotSet = int32(-1)

Docs.summary: Default value. If the value is , then the font attributes are inherited from the control's style, or, if the style is not defined, from the control's parent control. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption True = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The specified style will be applied. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
